megatron.transforms package¶

Submodules¶

megatron.transforms.common module¶

class megatron.transforms.common.TimeSeries(window_size, time_axis=1, reverse=False)¶

Bases: megatron.core.Transformation

Adds a time dimension to a dataset by rolling a window over the data.

Parameters:
  • window_size (int) – length of the window; number of timesteps in the time series.
  • time_axis (int) – on which axis in the array to place the time dimension.
  • reverse (bool) – if True, oldest data is first; if False, newest data is first.
transform(X)¶

Apply transformation to given input data.

Parameters:inputs (np.ndarray(s)) – input data to be transformed.
